item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m José.

This blog is a place where I document practical, reusable technical work — not tutorials written for clicks, and not trend-chasing summaries.

Most of what you’ll find here comes from things I actually use or maintain in real projects, including:

  • Migrating from WordPress to Hugo and other static site setups
  • Automating content workflows with AI and scripts
  • Building systems that are meant to run quietly for a long time
  • Notes from working remotely and living in the Philippines

I care more about why a solution was chosen than just how to implement it.
